title: MP008: Matt Heffner of Our Daily Rest – Make Time for Rest [PODCAST]
description: Matt Heffner and I got to share a great interview session together talking about some technical stuff, his wife's blog, what he's up to right now (at the time of this post) and plans for their future. We share a lot of similarities when it comes to leading a family, having an entrepreneurial spirit, and how to find the best ways we can make an impact on the world.​
